pproj.help: Name of the .pproj file in the project directory

dll.help: Path to generated .dll file, relative to project directory

partitions.help: Number of runs for parallel analysis, per method

timeout.help: Timeout for checker run in seconds, per method per partition

schedules.help: Number of schedules, per method per partition

max-steps.help: Max number of scheduling points in execution

methods.help: Suffixes of test methods to execute

polling-interval.help: How frequently to check for job completion, in seconds

psym-jar.help: Path to generated PSym .jar file, relative to project directory
